B" and "08B1-10F0100" is silkscreened on the board.
[http://www.kerneldump.org.uk/?cat=3 Huawei echolife HG612 category on kerneldump.org] :4C:ED:DE, '''Askey''' OUI [http://www.cupofcoffee.co.uk/2011/03/31/fibre-to-the-cabinet-fttc-installation/ Images of V1] :E8:39:DF, '''Askey''' OUI [http://www.cupofcoffee.co.uk/2011/08/15/fttc-huawei-echolife-hg612-feeling-hot-hot-hot/ Images of V2] :84:A8:E4, '''Huawei''' OUI
